title: Smallholder farmers' vulnerability to climate change and variability: Evidence from three agroecologies in the Upper Blue Nile, Ethiopia
content:
Publication date: 15 April 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 7

Author(s): Assefa A. Berhanu, Zewdu B. Ayele, Dessalegn C. Dagnew, Tadele Melese, Abeje B. Fenta, Koyachew E. Kassie
